duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet customers and proactively assist them with their shopping experience.
Maintain merchandising and presentation standards in accordance with company guidelines.
Promote company programs such as customer loyalty program participation, warranty sales, etc.
Adhere to safety, loss prevention, and standard operating procedures.
Create an inclusive store environment that is welcoming and safe for everyone.
Support the team across the store with an all-hands-on-deck approach.
